title: Divine Polki and Emerald Haaram - A Timeless Heirloom
features: This exquisite haaram showcases the unparalleled beauty of Polki diamonds, each delicately framed by a halo of sparkling pave set diamonds, creating a luminous glow. The design incorporates traditional South Indian aesthetics with the arrangement of the Polkis, and each polki is seperated by a gold bar, and is finished with vibrant, pear-shaped emerald drops that dance with every movement. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting shine and antique appearance. Perfect for any occasion
occasions: and cultural celebrations. Also suitable for making a statement at upscale social events.
description: Authentic Polki diamonds offer a unique sparkle and investment value. Meticulous craftsmanship by skilled artisans ensures durability and lasting beauty. The emerald drops add a touch of royalty and prosperity. This Haaram effortlessly blends traditional grandeur with contemporary elegance, making it a versatile addition to any jewelry collection.
